title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.4 - General rule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.4 - General rule

State Regulations
(a) No final
decision of the authority to carry out or approve an action shall be taken
until there has been full compliance with the provisions of this Part and 6
NYCRR Part
617, including the payment to the authority of all necessary fees
and costs. (b) For the purposes of
this Part, in certain instances, based on the applicant's preliminary
environmental documentation supplied to the authority, a tentative approval of
a proposed action involving an applicant may be granted. Such tentative
approval shall not constitute a final decision or determination by the
authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2500.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
